choices: Send your neighborough' son Mark, 17 yo
1.content:
you go to the school to take your five sons. The school is near your new house but need the car.
You park the car in the school parking and go to San Fernando de Valsecas school.
In which section you go first?
1.title: At school

choices: Micheal shares the bag with a friend
132.content:
You walk into the school to pick up your son, Micheal. His bookbag was on the ground and you picked it up. There seemed to be a small rock on the side of it. Wondering where he got it, you pick it up.

Then...something strange happens. The world gets bigger, and you begin to shrink! You end up in Micheal's bookbag, inside a bag of chips. "What in the..." then a bright light fills the bookbag and Micheal grabs the bag of chips, sending you into it!

You can hear your son's stomach growl..and realize the worse as Micheal grabs some chips.

"MIGUEL!!!" you yell
132.title: Chips! Oh no!

1321.content:
Your son grabs another chip, and this one has you on it! You yell as he lifts it into his mouth and starts to chew, avoiding his giant teeth.But then, you get sent back into his esophagus and land in his warm stomach.

You can barely swim in his stomach acids, and the heat doesn't help. But then, a gurgling sound echoes through his gullet, and he starts to digest his food. It feels like lava as the acids rip throughout your body, and the last thing you hear is Micheal burping
1321.title: Micheal grabs another chip

1322.content:
Another hand reaches into the bag... It's micheal's friend Jimmy. Jimmy is an athletic football(soccer) player, and you know he has quite the appetite...

He pulls out the chip you are on and adrenaline kicks in. You've got to jump! So... You take a leap of faith....

And land in Jimmy's shoe! It smells really bad from practice, but atleast you are alive, right? Jimmy's dad comes to pick him up, and you are along for the ride.

When Jimmy gets home....
1322.title: Micheal shares the bag with a friend

13221.content: Jimmy starts to take off his clothes, starting with his shoes. You are relevead to get some fresh air, but now you gotta move. Giant clothes were falling from the heavens! You make it to the bathroom door as Jimmy hops in the shower. Then, Jimmy's dad comes in! He....
13221.title: He takes a shower

132212.content:
As Jimmy's father comes in, his massive foot casts a shadow over you. It's too late before you realize he's bout to step on you! You try to run but....

*SQUISH*
132212.title: Does not notice you

choices: Ypu fall out of the boxers
13222.content:
Jimmy turns on the TV and kicks off his shoes, sending you falling to the ground. Before you could move again, his large socks fell on top of you, covering you in the smell. Jimmy's dad comes in....

"Niño, don't just leave your socks everywhere, ok?"
"Ok papa.." Jimmy bends down and grabs his socks, putting themin the washing machine...uh oh.

The water and soap nearly drown you! But when the washing cycle is over, Jimmy's dad, Marco, Grabs the clothes. You landed in his underwear...and he was putting them on.

You didn't even have time to respond as his musk filled the air. You were nearly crushed by his massive dick before....
13222.title: He watches some cartoons

info.brief_description: What happen when you shrink in a school full of hungry spanish kids
info.description:
You are David Filmore an american man of 40 yo and you decided to go to live in Spain two months ago. You always loved that country and now you and your wife Julia decided to transfer there with your four sons:
Michael 12yo;
Alex 9yo;
Eric 5yo;
Jake 3yo;

One day you go to school to take your sons but something happen....you Shrink.

No rules and enjoy...
